alert.note: Alert for Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 11:18AM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Chicago IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Kankakee River at Momence affecting Kankakee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a combination of snowmelt and heavy river ice. * WHERE...Kankakee River from the IL/IN state line downstream to confluence with Iroquois River at Aroma Park, including the Momence gauge. * WHEN...From this morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of roadways, yards, agricultural land, wetlands along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 4.4 feet. Kankakee County Emergency Management indicated shifting ice and multiple ice jams occurring along the Kankakee River from near Kankakee upstream to near Sun River Terrace. Water levels are rising in multiple areas upstream of ice jams. - Forecast...Shifting and breaking of river ice may cause new ice jams and flooding. Ice jams upstream of the area are breaking up, which could cause additional ice to accumulate in the area. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means water levels above flood stage are imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers and streams in the warned area should take immediate precautions to protect life and property. An ice jam is affecting water levels in this area. River forecasts during ice jams are less certain due to many complicated factors. Significant river ice cover can cause large water level fluctuations and flooding with little advanced notice. River ice may also cause gauge observations to be inaccurate. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM CST.
